metadata.documentation: Transmitted through Unidata Internet Data Distribution.

NCEP North American Model: AWIPS 242 (S) Grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Horizontal = 553 by 425 points, resolution 11.25 km, Polar Stereographic projection Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels.

variables.variable: Parcel lifted index to 500 hPa @ pressure_difference2
Probablity of 1 tenth inch Precipipation POP @ surface
Water equivalent of accumulated snow depth @ surface
Wind direction from which blowing @ height_above_ground

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model: AWIPS 217 (Y) Grid over Alaska - Double Resolution. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 60 hours. Horizontal = 277 by 213 points, resolution 22.5 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = surface, height above ground, pressure layer (2D levels only)

variable.name: Mean_sea_level_pressure_ETA_model
variable.vocabulary_name: Mean sea level pressure ETA model

variables.variable: Mean sea level pressure ETA model @ msl

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 216 (V) grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 60 hours. Horizontal = 139 by 107 points, resolution 45.0 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

variable.name: Mean_sea_level_pressure_ETA_model
variable.vocabulary_name: Mean sea level pressure ETA model

variables.variable: Mean sea level pressure ETA model @ msl

regExpOnName.replaceString: Latest NCEP NAM Alaska 45 km - NOAAPORT

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 216 (V) grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Horizontal = 139 by 107 points, resolution 45.0 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

variable.name: Mean_sea_level_pressure_ETA_model
variable.vocabulary_name: Mean sea level pressure ETA model

variables.variable: Mean sea level pressure ETA model @ msl
3-hr pressure tendency Std Atmos Red @ entire_atmosphere

regExpOnName.replaceString: Latest NCEP NAM Alaska 45 km - CONDUIT

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 207 (N) Regional - Alaska. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out to 60 hours. Horizontal = 49 by 35 points, resolution 95.25 km, Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels.

variable.name: Mean_sea_level_pressure_ETA_model
variable.vocabulary_name: Mean sea level pressure ETA model

variables.variable: Mean sea level pressure ETA model @ msl

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 218 (B) grid over the continental United States - Model runs are made at 06Z, 12Z, 18Z and 00Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Horizontal = 614 by 428 points, resolution 12.19 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels.

variables.variable: Parcel lifted index to 500 hPa @ pressure_difference2
Probablity of 1 tenth inch Precipipation POP @ surface
Water equivalent of accumulated snow depth @ surface
Wind direction from which blowing @ height_above_ground

dataset.name: NCEP NAM CONUS 20 km
dataset.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 215(U) grid over the continental United States - Quadruple Resolution. Horizontal = 369 by 257 points, resolution 20.31 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = surface, height above ground, 2D only.

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 215(U) grid over the continental United States - Quadruple Resolution. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Horizontal = 369 by 257 points, resolution 20.31 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = surface, height above ground, layers, and 1000 to 150 hPa pressure levels.

variable.name: Mean_sea_level_pressure_ETA_model
variable.vocabulary_name: Mean sea level pressure ETA model

variables.variable: Mean sea level pressure ETA model @ msl

regExpOnName.replaceString: Latest NCEP NAM CONUS 20 km - Surface

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 215(U) grid over the continental United States - Quadruple Resolution. Model runs are made at 00Z, and 12Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours; and at 06Z, and 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 48 hours. Horizontal = 369 by 257 points, resolution 20.31 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = surface, 2m, and 10m, 2D fields only.

regExpOnName.replaceString: Latest NCEP NAM CONUS 20 km - Select Surface

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 215(U) grid over the continental United States - Quadruple Resolution. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 48 hours. Horizontal = 369 by 257 points, resolution 20.31 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = surface, height above ground, and 1000 to 30 hPa pressure levels.

variable.name: Mean_sea_level_pressure_ETA_model
variable.vocabulary_name: Mean sea level pressure ETA model

variables.variable: Mean sea level pressure ETA model @ msl

regExpOnName.replaceString: Latest NCEP NAM CONUS 20 km - NOAAPORT

dataset.name: NCEP NAM CONUS 40 km
dataset.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 212 (R) Regional - CONUS - Double Resolution. Horizontal = 185 by 129 points, resolution 40.63 km; LambertConformal projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 212 (R) Regional - CONUS - Double Resolution. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z and have analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Horizontal = 185 by 129 points, resolution 40.63 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = surface, 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels, layers, and depth.

variables.variable: Clear sky upward solar flux @ layer_between_two_depths_below_surface

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 211 (Q) Regional - CONUS (Lambert Conformal). Model runs are made at 12Z and 00Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out to 60 hours.
